faculty.name: Enviso
faculty.description: Makes safety and innovation fun, turning serious messages into stories everyone loves.

faculty.name: Sereen Atif
faculty.description: Oversees the team and provides academic and strategic guidance.

executives.name: Subhan
executives.description: Big vision, bigger crises, still wondering what exactly a lead does.

executives.name: Sadus
executives.description: Juggles tasks, people, and deadlines, still unsure if it’s management or damage control.

secondary.name: Maaz
secondary.description: Manages mechanical, electrical, and R&D, always busy, never caught working.

secondary.name: Hamdan
secondary.description: Operations handles the behind-the-scenes herapheri, the chaos no one else wants.

secondary.name: Osman
secondary.description: Always around with a nod of approval, keeps the team in check with quiet wisdom (or so he think).

secondary.name: Haider
secondary.description: Always agrees with everything, the most supportive bystander we could ask for.

departmentLeads.name: Saad
departmentLeads.description:
Meet Saad - our Mechanical Lead and the mastermind behind everything that moves. From the tyres to the chassis, every mechanical component is built under his command. His department goes head-to-head for technical awards in the competitions, where performance, precision, and innovation take the spotlight.

 Funfact: His department's people are often called the garage mechanics.

Chassis / Structure / Body.description: The Structure division designs lightweight, aerodynamically efficient, and structurally robust body and chassis systems, balancing performance, safety, and manufacturability.

Powertrain.description: The Powertrain division develops and integrates both internal combustion and electric propulsion systems, focusing on efficiency, reliability, and optimal energy transfer.

Vehicle Dynamics.description: The Vehicle Dynamics team works on steering, braking, suspension and overall handling to ensure control, stability, and a smooth driving experience.

departmentLeads.name: Yaseen
departmentLeads.description:
Meet Yaseen - our Electrical Lead and the one powering everything behind the scenes. From wiring up the motor to managing the battery systems and control circuits, every electrical component runs through him. His department competes for technical awards in the competitions, where efficiency and reliability can make all the difference.

Funfact: His department's people are of coure often called the electricians - (lights are the best thing they can make work)

Data & Telemetry.description: The Data & Telemetry division collects, transmits, and analyzes real-time vehicle data, enabling performance optimization, diagnostics, and informed decision-making.

Controls.description: The Controls division develops precise control systems and algorithms, integrating powertrain, braking, and steering for smooth, safe, and efficient vehicle operation.

departmentLeads.name: Yousuf
departmentLeads.description:
Meet Yousuf - our Marketing Lead. His department is the one chasing down sponsors, partnerships, and everything in between to keep the team running - from funds to essential services. 

While there’s no shiny award for marketing at our competitions, without their hustle, we will not be able to make it to the start line. his department also handles team's official LinkedIn. 

Funfact: The most doubted department - do they even work if they dont bring any sponsor huh?

departmentLeads.name: Ahzam
departmentLeads.description:
Meet Ahzam - our Brand Manager and Communications Lead. He’s the brain behind our social media, the guy steering our media team, and the reason our work looks as good online as it performs on track.

Under his lead, the communications department is actively competing for the Shell Eco-marathon Communications Award - aiming to bring home recognition for our storytelling and outreach.

Funfact: His people are either praised or mocked for making awesome/cringe content

autonomousProject.description:
Our Autonomous Project is where innovation meets intelligence. Focused on building self-driving, energy-efficient vehicles.  It's our leap into the future of mobility, where the car doesn’t just move - it thinks. Very much visionary stuff yk! 

 Funfact: they recently made history by being the first participation from Pakistan in an autonomous vehicle competition
